A person wearing a yellow floral dress and brown sandals walks across the tiles, adding movement to the scene. The focus remains on the floor's detailed pattern and the gentle motion of the person's steps, creating a harmonious blend of color and texture.**

Please note that the video features **salient human subjects**, so you should focus on describing the spatial framing and movements of them.
